Define class abstract_method with attribute(s) and method(s). Creating custom decorator for class methods.
class ats_utilities.abstract.abstract_method(method_to_abstract, verbose=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Define class abstract_method with attribute(s) and method(s). Creating custom decorator for class methods. It defines:

attributes:
__slots__ - Setting class slots
VERBOSE - Console text indicator for current process-phase
method_name - Class method name
method_class_name - Method class name
method_type - Class method type
method - Class method
methods:
__init__ - Initial constructor
__call__ - Raise exception NotImplementedError (mark as abstract method)
VERBOSE = 'ATS_UTILITIES::ABSTRACT_METHOD'¶
method¶
method_class_name¶
method_name¶
method_type¶
